name: Dragons Grow 2D
description:
The very first Alpha release is now in progress. Since everything is new and limited time is available to work on this, it'll take a while.

I suggest you do not purchase this game at this time.

In this version, Dragon Grow 2D features:

  • Turn-based battle
  • Side-scrolling
  • Single-player
  • 1 Tutorial level
  • 3 Maps
  • 2 Playable Dragons
  • 4 Abilities
  • 3 Attack moves
